message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line item and value representing the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is typically shown as "Depreciation" in the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the line item "Depreciation" with a value of 91509.94 on 2024-02-01.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is exactly what I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91509.94'} }
```
